page.title: 12Godalming Middle School
page.content: The School is 95 years old and was built in 1913.The school has 230 children on roll and 20 staff,of which 11 are teaching.The subjects taught are:Maths,English,French,Craft, Homecraft, Physical education, History, Geography and R.E.. At lunchtime about 150 children have sandwiches in school less than half that amount have school dinners, and roughly 20 go home. The school offers many extra curricular activities including athletics, netball, badminton, table tennis, chess and gym. The school has football, netball, swimming and chess teams. The school also offers many one day trips to local places of interest, and the children are able to go on two residential visits to another part of Britain and Northern France.
